Room.Name: Khelleva Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Khelleva Drive, between the Mansion and the Stables.
Room.LongDescription: Khelleva Drive is a small road which runs through the Khelleva Estate, splitting the great Mansion apart from the Khelleva Stables. The mansion can be seen to the east of the road and the stables are located on the south side of the road. The entrance to both establishments may be found on Khelleva road to the southeast.
